Araragi is a family surname that normally refers to Koyomi Araragi. It could also be used to refer to his other family members, such as:

Karen Araragi, his athletic younger sister, once poisoned by a wreathe-fire bee.
Tsukihi Araragi, his intellectual younger sister, actually an immortal phoenix.
The Araragi Matriarch, the mother of the siblings.
The Araragi Residence, the family home.
